contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Okres velky.png|thumb|right|300px|[[Veľký Krtíš District]] in the Banská Bystrica region]] '''Zombor''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in the [[Veľký Krtíš District]] of the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of southern [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region]] ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Velky Krtis District}} {{coord|48|08|N|19|27|E|region:SK_type:city|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zombor, Velky Krtis District}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Veľký Krtíš District]] {{VeľkýKrtíš-geo-stub}}
